channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sora copycats flooded Apple’s App Store, and some still remain
item.description: Imposter Sora apps saw hundreds of thousands of downloads before Apple pulled them from the App Store.

item.title: Apple Took Down These ICE-Tracking Apps. The Developers Aren't Giving Up
item.description: “We are going to do everything in our power to fight this,” says ICEBlock developer Joshua Aaron after Apple removed his app from the App Store.

item.title: How China Is Hoping to Attract Tech Talent
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we uncover how America's new $100,000 H-1B golden visa has thrown tech workers and their employers into chaos.

item.title: Stoke Space’s $510M round shows the future of launch belongs to defense
item.description: Stoke's new raise highlights how the launch industry is being shaped by major U.S. defense initiatives.

item.title: Discord suffers data breach impacting at least 70,000 users
item.description: The platform said in a press release that hackers breached a third-party vendor that Discord uses for age-related appeals.

item.title: Intel unveils new processor powered by its 18A semiconductor tech
item.description: Intel announces new processors produced in Arizona as the company looks to increase its U.S. manufacturing.

item.title: Our Favorite Motorola Smartphone Is $100 Off
item.description: The impressive and unique Motorola Razr Ultra sees an appealing post-Prime Day discount.

item.title: Italian businessman’s phone reportedly targeted with Paragon spyware
item.description: The alleged targeting of prominent Italian businessman Francesco Gaetano Caltagirone now widens the Paragon spyware scandal in Italy to victims beyond...

item.title: Europe Pledges $600 Billion for Clean Energy Projects in Africa
item.description: The EU’s Global Gateway plan is challenging China’s Belt and Road Initiative to influence Africa, by providing funding that will expand access to elec...

item.title: We Found 136 of the Best Prime Day Deals Still on for 2025: Up to 55% Off
item.description: Amazon's fall 2025 Prime Day sale has come and gone, but a few of the best deals are still available.
